articles.description: Despite "mixed messages," after a round of negotiations with the Reserve Bank of India, crypto regulations should be more lax than anticipated
articles.content:
Yet another crypto ban turns out to be temporary FUD.
In an interview with CNBC this morning, Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that reports of a blanket ban on cryptocurrencies are ov… [+1768 chars]
